name: Black Market Auction House
description: A backport of the Black Market Auction House system from later WoW expansions. Allows players to bid on rare items through a special auction house interface. Features both server-side and client-side components. Requires both server and client modifications. Complex installation process.
author: Stephen Kania

name: Extended Holidays
description: Allows server administrators to enable or disable specific in-game holidays through a simple configuration table. Automatically activates configured holidays on server startup with console output for verification. Simple boolean table for 22+ holidays including Brewfest, Hallow's End, Winter Veil, etc.
author: Unknown

name: Dynamic Trader
description: A sophisticated dynamic pricing market system that simulates an auction house economy. Features inflation, time-based price fluctuations, buy/sell mechanics, and GM management commands. Designed for smaller servers lacking active auction houses. NPC #180000 + .vprices, .vbp, .vsp commands. Economy balance based on authentic vanilla values.
author: Dinkledork

name: Account-Wide Features
description: Comprehensive account-wide sharing system with 8 independent modules. Each system can be enabled/disabled individually and creates dedicated database tables for persistence. Systems: Achievements, Currency, Money, Mounts, Pets, PvP Rank/Stats, Reputation, Taxi Paths, Titles
author: Unknown

name: Faster Mounts
description: Increases mount and travel form speeds beyond default values. Includes automatic mount learning at level 10, enhanced shapeshift speeds, and faster ghost/dead movement. Speed increases: Ground mounts 160%→220%, 200%→250%; Flying 250%→340%, 380%→450%
author: Unknown

name: Tier Vendors
description: Adds three vendor NPCs that sell tier gear and raid loot from earlier raid tiers. Designed for gear collection and catch-up mechanics on solo servers. Three separate vendor NPCs for different tier sets. Configurable NPC entry IDs to avoid conflicts.

name: AzerothCore Multi-Vendor System
description: Vendor system allowing multiple items per vendor with enhanced functionality. Streamlines vendor management and provides more flexible item distribution options. Note: Archive includes TrinityCore version. Requires SQL setup for vendor configurations.
author: AzerothCore Community

name: Starting NPC System
description: NPC system for new character initialization and starting assistance. Provides guided character setup and initial resources for new players. Comprehensive starting experience for new characters with SQL import required.
author: AzerothCore Community

name: Global Mail Banking Auctions
description: Cross-server mail, banking, and auction house access system. Allows players to access these services globally without location restrictions, enhancing server accessibility. Quality of life improvement removing location restrictions from essential services.
author: AzerothCore Community

name: Starting Zone Selector
description: Advanced starting zone selection system with custom UI interface. Allows players to choose their starting zone regardless of race, with client-side UI enhancements via included patch file. Professional system with client patch for enhanced UI. Includes NPC spawns and zone configurations.
author: AzerothCore Community

name: AzerothCore Trivia System
description: Comprehensive trivia system with over 700 questions, achievements, titles, and custom DBC files. Features intelligent question rotation, scoring system, and reward mechanisms including custom titles and achievements. Major system with extensive database requirements and custom DBC files. Professional trivia implementation with achievements.
author: AzerothCore Community

name: Wowhead Integration Mod
description: Full-stack Wowhead integration system with Python backend, Docker deployment, and Lua frontend. Provides server integration with Wowhead database for enhanced item/quest information and web interface. Complex full-stack system with web backend. Requires Docker deployment and Python environment setup.
author: AzerothCore Community

name: Auto Resurrection System
description: Simple automatic resurrection system that revives players upon death. Basic utility script for removing death penalties and maintaining gameplay flow. Minimal implementation with basic auto-resurrection functionality.
author: Acore Community

name: Boss Timer System
description: Advanced boss encounter timer system with database tracking. Monitors boss spawn times, death timers, and respawn schedules for raid content management and player information. Comprehensive boss tracking with database persistence. Essential for raid scheduling and server management.
author: Acore Community

name: CarbonCopy Character System
description: Advanced character cloning and copying system. Allows complete duplication of character stats, gear, spells, and progression. Useful for character backup, testing, or player assistance scenarios. Major character management system with comprehensive cloning capabilities. Professional-grade implementation.
author: Acore Community

name: Custom World Boss Documentation
description: Documentation and visual assets for custom world boss system implementation. Contains images and setup instructions but no Lua implementation files. Documentation-only resource. No Lua implementation files present - may require separate implementation.
author: Acore Community

name: Discord Notifier System
description: Discord integration system for server notifications and events. Sends automated messages to Discord channels for server events, player actions, and administrative notifications. Discord webhook integration for server event notifications. Requires Discord bot setup and webhook configuration.
author: Acore Community

name: Eluna Testing Framework
description: Comprehensive Eluna testing framework with extensive test cases and database integration. Professional testing suite for validating Lua scripts, server functions, and database operations. Major development tool with 958 lines of comprehensive testing. Essential for Lua script development and validation.
author: Acore Community

name: Exchange NPC System
description: Advanced NPC-based item exchange and trading system. Allows players to exchange items, currencies, and resources through configurable NPC interfaces with database persistence. Professional exchange system with comprehensive trading mechanics and database integration.
author: Acore Community

name: Event Scripts Collection
description: Comprehensive collection of 5 event systems: Custom World Boss (111KB), Fun Tools (30KB), Hide and Seek (9.3KB), Bonus Buffs (3.8KB), and Camera Teleport (3.1KB). Complete event management suite. Massive event system collection with 5 major components. Professional-grade event management with extensive functionality.
author: Acore Community

name: Hunter Pet Reset Utility
description: Simple hunter utility to reset pet talent points. Basic functionality for hunter pet management and talent redistribution.
author: Isidorsson Development Team
location: Script Packs/Isidorsson Script Pack/Eluna-scripts/Quality of life stuff/Hunter/

name: Solo System Ideas
description: A comprehensive 38KB document containing 1,266 lines of ideas and concepts for solo systems that could be implemented in AzerothCore. This serves as a design document and inspiration source for future script development. Design document and inspiration source for future script development
author: Unknown
files: Ideas for Solo Systems for AzerothCore.md (38KB, 1,266 lines)

name: Level Up Reward System
description: Comprehensive level-up reward system that automatically sends mail with gold and items when players reach specific levels. Features player ranking system, configurable rewards, and lore-friendly mail messages. Includes database tracking of player progression. Default rewards: 1g@10, 7g@20, 18g@30, 35g@40, 70g@50, 140g@60, 280g@70, 500g@80. Includes item rewards and player ranking system.
author: Honey (Ragundah)

name: Loot Statistics Tracker
description: Simple loot tracking system that monitors and logs the drop rates of specific items. Tracks 12 common materials (cloth, leather, herbs, fish) and saves statistics to database with timestamps for analysis. Tracks: Linen/Wool/Silk/Mageweave/Runecloth, Light/Medium/Heavy/Thick Leather, Purple Lotus, Raw Spotted Yellowtail, Rugged Leather. Saves on server shutdown.
author: Honey

name: Buff NPC System
description: Interactive buff NPC that provides level-appropriate buffs to players. Features 19 random phrases, 14 whisper messages, periodic announcements, and automatic buff application based on player level. Includes resurrection aura removal. NPC #400117. Level-based buff progression: 1-9 (3 buffs), 10-19 (3 buffs), 20-29 (4 buffs), 30-39 (6 buffs), 40-49 (5 buffs), 50+ (6 buffs). 40-second announcement timer.
author: Unknown (Stygian Core conversion)

name: Mythic Plus Dungeon System
description: Mythic Plus-style dungeon difficulty system with 10 difficulty levels. Features dynamic creature scaling, custom multipliers for low-level dungeons, and persistent difficulty tracking. Includes custom spell auras and map-specific configurations. NPC #90005. Custom spell auras: 107077-107080. Supports Deadmines (36) and custom map configurations. Difficulty multiplier: 1.08^level. Requires custom spell DBC.
author: Dinkledork

name: Random Attack System
description: Pseudo world PvP system that spawns random NPCs to attack players on zone updates. Features configurable attack chance (10%), level scaling, health multipliers (1.65x), and custom dialogue. Designed for open-world encounters. Configurable: MAX_NPC_SPAWN (1), ATTACK_CHANCE (10%), creature entries, dialogue options. Excludes dungeons/raids/BGs. Spawns within 10 units of player.
author: Unknown

name: Unlimited Ammo System
description: Automatic ammo replenishment system for hunters and ranged weapons. Supports bows, guns, and crossbows with comprehensive item ID lists. Features configurable thresholds and maximum ammo limits. Includes enable/disable command. Supports 24 arrow types, 30 bullet types. Threshold: 52 ammo, Max: 1000 ammo. Command: .ua to enable. Requires single ammo type in bags.
author: Dinkledork (TurekSY)

name: Recruit a Friend System
description: Comprehensive Recruit a Friend system with account linking, summoning capabilities, and tiered rewards. Features IP abuse detection, automatic reward distribution, and database tracking. Includes web integration support for acore_cms. Commands: .bindraf, .forcebindraf, .raf, .raf summon. Default target: level 39, 30-day duration. Rewards: Mini-Thor (1st), Nether Cloth Bag (3rd), Diablos Stone (5th), Tyrael's Hilt (10th).
author: Honey

name: Send and Bind System
description: GM command system for sending soulbound items via mail. Converts Bind on Equip items to soulbound when sent through the system. Features logging, error handling, and online/offline player support. Command: .senditemandbind $targetGUID $itemID [$amount] [message]. Min GM rank: 2. Creates send-and-bind.log file. Supports both online and offline players.
author: Honey

name: Sort Machine System
description: Advanced database optimization tool that sorts item GUIDs to eliminate gaps and fix inconsistencies. Supports character inventory, guild bank, mail items, and custom tables. Creates SQL files for safe execution. Command: .sortguid. Min GM rank: 4. Creates sortguid.sql file. Supports custom tables. WARNING: Requires server downtime and backups. Test thoroughly before use.
author: Honey (Disclosurez)

name: Summon All System
description: Allows players to summon their entire party or raid with a single command. Features map restrictions, combat checks, and configurable allowed zones. Designed for convenience in group content. Command: .summonall. Restrictions: No combat, specific maps only. Default allowed: Eastern Kingdoms, Kalimdor, Outland, Northrend. All players can use.
author: Honey

name: Temporary Announcements
description: Temporary announcement system for repeated server-wide broadcasts. Features configurable intervals, repetition counts, and persistent scheduling across server restarts. Includes management commands for active announcements. Commands: .tannounce $min $amount $text, .tannounce list, .tannounce delete $id. Forbidden chars: []';. Supports infinite repetition (0 amount).
author: Honey

name: Zone Debuff System
description: Zone-based buff/debuff system that modifies player stats, damage, and health in specific areas. Supports dungeons, raids, battlegrounds, and world buff removal. DEPRECATED - use mod-zone-difficulty instead. DEPRECATED - Use mod-zone-difficulty instead. Configurable for dungeons, raids, BGs. Includes custom spell effects. May require custom AzerothCore hooks.
author: Honey

name: Zone Check System
description: Automated player kicking system based on zone restrictions. Features configurable zone lists, GM exclusions, and database logging. Designed for server security and content gating. Excludes GMs level 1+. Configurable zone lists. Creates custom database scheme. Automatic player removal from restricted zones.
author: Honey (Roboto)

name: Event Scripts Collection
description: Comprehensive event system collection including custom world bosses, fun tools, bonus buffs, and hide-and-seek games. Features website integration, scoring systems, and multiple event types for server engagement. Commands: .startevent, .stopevent, .fun gurubashi/halaa, .bonusbuff. Supports 5man/raid encounters, Gurubashi/Halaa events, website integration. Includes video examples.
author: Honey

name: Active Chat System
description: Artificial chat system that simulates active world and guild conversations. Features customizable text tables, interactive dialogues, and placeholders for zones, instances, classes, and roles. Designed for single-player server immersion. Configurable intervals: World chat 1-10s, Guild chat 10-30s. Placeholders: %zone%, %instance%, %class%, %role%, %bg%. Extensible text tables. Single-player immersion focus.
author: Unknown (Modified)

name: Arena Spectator System
description: Arena spectator system with custom UI addon and server-side integration. Features TidyPlates integration, custom textures, combat feedback, and spectator tools. Includes media files and widget system.
author: Unknown

name: Astoria Classless System
description: Implements a classless system allowing players to build characters without class restrictions. Includes custom UI, LUA logic, and SQL for database integration. Requires database setup and custom UI integration.

name: MythicPlus Dungeon System
description: Implements a Mythic+ dungeon system with affixes (Bolstering, Necrotic, Raging, Sanguine, etc.), level setting, and exit handling. Inspired by retail WoW's Mythic+ system. All files are required for the full Mythic+ experience.
author: Dinkledork

name: Quest Fixes Pack
description: Includes 30+ individual Lua scripts that modify or patch quest behaviors. The specific issues addressed by each script are not documented, so the necessity and impact of each fix is unclear. Use with caution and review each script before applying to your server. This pack contains 30+ quest fix scripts. The reason for each fix is not documented. Review before use.
author: Dinkledork
